title: ALL Thanks and Praise Be Unto Our FATHER(ALL IN ALL HIS Children)!
content:
Thankfully i have "received a love of The TRUTH" and been "Born Again" of The Holy, Set Apart, SPIRIT! In spite of me, not because of me.......
http://asimpleandspirituallife.blogspot.com/2013/05/one-needs-receive-love-of-truth-to-be.html
http://asimpleandspirituallife.blogspot.com/2013/07/miracles-faith-receiving-love-of-truth.html
Yet, i am !NOW! a brother of The Messiah, and "a son of Our FATHER(ABBA) and GOD(ELOHIM)"! And thankfully i have my portion !NOW! in HIS Family "ON EARTH"....... (John 3:3,7. I Peter 1:23, Matthew 12:49-50, John 20:17; 14:28, Mark 10:18, Ephesians 3:15, Galatians 6:10)
http://asimpleandspirituallife.blogspot.com/2011/07/family-of-faith-or-system-of-religion.html
A Messianic Jew, and a Hebrew(aka: one from beyond) indeed and TRUTH! (Romans 2:28-29)
http://asimpleandspirituallife.blogspot.com/2014/11/the-new-covenant-and-new-covenant-jew.html
http://asimpleandspirituallife.blogspot.com/2010/07/who-is-hebrew.html
So it is i choose to remain but an "alien and pilgrim while on the earth"....... (Hebrews 11:13, I Peter 2:11)
http://asimpleandspirituallife.blogspot.com/2015/06/are-you-alien-and-pilgrim-while-on-earth.html
And soon, and very soon, i will be taken Home, Home at last! (John 14:2-3)
http://asimpleandspirituallife.blogspot.com/2015/01/home-home-at-last-john-141-3.html
Thankfully such IS a Living, Lively Hope!
http://asimpleandspirituallife.blogspot.com/2010/10/hope-of-heaven-for-hope-which-is-laid.html
Till then:
FATHER Help!
HE DID!       and HE does.......
ALL Thanks and Praise Be Unto Our FATHER(TRUTH, SPIRIT, CREATOR, GOD, LORD, MASTER, LIGHT, LOVE, LIFE,,,,,,, ALL IN ALL that which IS Truly GOOD)! (John 20:17: 14:28, Mark 10:18)
